mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exchange_post ( user_id, third_cate_id, exchange_post_title, post_description, post_location_code, post_location_name, post_hope_region, post_trade_type, delivery_price_normal, delivery_price_half, half_delivery_type, location) VALUES (#{userId}, #{post.thirdCateId}, #{post.exchangePostTitle}, #{post.postDescription}, #{post.postLocationCode}, #{post.postLocationName}, #{post.postHopeRegion}, #{post.postTradeType}, #{post.deliveryPriceNormal}, #{post.deliveryPriceHalf}, #{post.halfDeliveryType}, -- 2. PostGIS 형식에 맞게 경도(lng), 위도(lat) 값을 추가합니다. ST_SetSRID(ST_MakePoint(#{post.longitude}, #{post.latitude}), 4326) )
INSERT INTO exchange_post_image (exchange_post_id, post_image_url, post_sort_order) VALUES (#{exchangePostId}, #{imageUrl}, #{sortOrder})
mapper.select: SELECT exchange_post_id AS exchangePostId, third_cate_id AS thirdCateId, exchange_post_title AS exchangePostTitle, post_description AS postDescription, post_location_code AS postLocationCode, post_location_name AS postLocationName, post_hope_region AS postHopeRegion, post_trade_type AS postTradeType, delivery_price_normal AS deliveryPriceNormal, delivery_price_half AS deliveryPriceHalf, half_delivery_type AS halfDeliveryType FROM exchange_post WHERE exchange_post_id = #{postId}
mapper.update: UPDATE exchange_post SET third_cate_id = #{post.thirdCateId}, exchange_post_title = #{post.exchangePostTitle}, post_description = #{post.postDescription}, post_hope_region = #{post.postHopeRegion}, post_trade_type = #{post.postTradeType}, delivery_price_normal = #{post.deliveryPriceNormal}, delivery_price_half = #{post.deliveryPriceHalf}, exchange_post_updated_at = now() WHERE exchange_post_id = #{postId}
